data.name: InvalidCode
data.value: The reset link is invalid or expired.

data.name: EmailNotConfirmed
data.value: Your email is not confirmed yet.

data.name: ConfirmationEmailSent
data.value: If the account exists, we have sent a confirmation email.

data.name: RateLimitExceeded
data.value: Too many requests. Please try again in a few minutes.

data.name: FileTooLarge
data.value: The file is too large. Max size is 1.5 MB.

data.name: InvalidImageType
data.value: Invalid file type. Use JPG or PNG.

data.name: ImageTooSmall
data.value: The image is too small. Minimum size is 128x128.

data.name: ImageTooLarge
data.value: The image is too large. Maximum size is 2048x2048.
